DOC.brief_summary: Low level laser therapy ( LLLT ) show affect muscle performance fatigue . The aim study investigate effect B-cure laser muscle performance recovery intense exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Low Level Laser Irradiation Muscle Performance Recovery
DOC.criteria: Healthy physical education student , age 2035 , light intermediate skin color musculoskeletal injury hip knees previous 2 month , use pharmacological agent nutritional supplement regularly , smoker , physical limitation complete exercise test
